description.displayText: Ms. Sheena was a real charm my grandmother absolutely adored her, we've had 2 caregiver before and while all had very good qualities Ms Sheena what just awesome her personality can ease any grumpy soul that radiant smile and positive attitude  truly reliable and professional making sure all appointment are filled medication are given on time and most importantly she was more than a caregiver more like family.
